alert.note: Alert for Platte (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 09 at 4:57PM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR INCREASED RIVER FLOW AND POSSIBLE ICE JAM FORMATION IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...The break up of an ice jam west of Columbus is expected to produce water rises along the Loup River. Water rises should remain within the rivers traditional banks, unless additional ice jams occur. In which case minor flooding of low lying areas is possible. * WHERE...A portion of the Loup River between the Highway 81 Bridge and the Loup Rivers junction with the Platte River. * WHEN...Until 445 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas may occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 438 PM CST, emergency management reported the break up of an ice jam up stream of the Highway 81 Bridge.
